post.text: Parents just want to give their kids a better life. That's what growing up in small business families meant for Tim and Hillary. We're going to keep fighting so every family has that opportunity.

comment.author: Nikki
comment.text: Hillary, NO! Your economic plan will bankrupt small business and put more people out of business! Small business can not pay high taxes, high health insurance, high wages. YOU DON'T UNDERSTAND HILLARY! YOU HAVE NEVER HIRED ANYONE HILLARY! You pay women less than the average! We can't afford you Hillary! Tell the truth! #neverhillary #crookedhillary
